AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Type yes to active or no to deactivate (lowercase only)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Type yes to active or no to deactivate (lowercase only)

AUTO_READ.description: Type yes to active or no to deactivate (lowercase only)

AUTO_REACT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

ANTICALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reject calls

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto like status

PM_PERMIT.description: Type yes to block others from using bot in PM, or no to allow

PRESENCE.description: 1 online, 2 typing, 3 recording, or blank for real state

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Put yes to enable anti delete message or no to disable
